img.rs-layer: Henry Ford Learning Institute : The Alameda School for Art + Design - Copyright 2017

Henry Ford Academy
Alameda School for Art + Design
501 W Cesar Chavez Blvd San Antonio, TX 78207
Mike Schmidt - Chair Cora Christmas Townsend McNitt Henry R. Munoz III Ziad Ojakli Brent Ott Deborah K. Parizek

In accordance with Texas law, admission to Henry Ford Academy: Alameda School for Art + Design is open to all students residing in the city of San Antonio (within the designated boundaries), prohibits discrimination in admission policy on the basis of sex, national origin, ethnicity, religion, disability, academic, artistic, or athletic ability, or the district the child would otherwise attend in accordance with this code.
img.a: Henry Ford Academy: Alameda School for Art + Design is a tuition-free public school
